mn116:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati isigilismiṃ pabbate.
mn116:2.1: “Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, etaṃ vebhāraṃ pabbatan”ti?
mn116:2.3: “Etassapi kho, bhikkhave, vebhārassa pabbatassa aññāva samaññā ahosi aññā paññatti.
mn116:2.4: Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, etaṃ paṇḍavaṃ pabbatan”ti?
mn116:2.6: “Etassapi kho, bhikkhave, paṇḍavassa pabbatassa aññāva samaññā ahosi aññā paññatti.
mn116:2.7: Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, etaṃ vepullaṃ pabbatan”ti?
mn116:2.9: “Etassapi kho, bhikkhave, vepullassa pabbatassa aññāva samaññā ahosi aññā paññatti.
mn116:2.10: Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, etaṃ gijjhakūṭaṃ pabbatan”ti?
mn116:2.12: “Etassapi kho, bhikkhave, gijjhakūṭassa pabbatassa aññāva samaññā ahosi aññā paññatti.
mn116:2.13: Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, imaṃ isigiliṃ pabbatan”ti?
mn116:3.1: “Imassa kho pana, bhikkhave, isigilissa pabbatassa esāva samaññā ahosi esā paññatti.
mn116:3.2: Bhūtapubbaṃ, bhikkhave, pañca paccekabuddhasatāni imasmiṃ isigilismiṃ pabbate ciranivāsino ahesuṃ.
mn116:3.3: Te imaṃ pabbataṃ pavisantā dissanti, paviṭṭhā na dissanti.
mn116:3.10: Taṃ suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
mn116:3.11: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ.
mn116:4.1: “Ariṭṭho nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṃ isigilismiṃ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:4.2: upariṭṭho nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṃ isigilismiṃ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:4.3: tagarasikhī nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṃ isigilismiṃ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:4.4: yasassī nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṃ isigilismiṃ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:4.5: sudassano nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṃ isigilismiṃ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:4.6: piyadassī nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṃ isigilismiṃ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:4.7: gandhāro nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṃ isigilismiṃ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:4.8: piṇḍolo nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṃ isigilismiṃ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:4.9: upāsabho nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṃ isigilismiṃ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:4.10: nīto nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṃ isigilismiṃ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:4.11: tatho nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṃ isigilismiṃ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi,
mn116:4.12: sutavā nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṃ isigilismiṃ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:4.13: bhāvitatto nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṃ isigilismiṃ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi.
mn116:6.10: Aṅgo ca paṅgo ca guttijito ca;
